Name: Dragons Be
About the game: Dragons Be is a three-part Episodic 2d action/adventure side-scrolling game. It's a throw-back to the 16-bit era with modern flare. It has all the action of Megaman, all the attitude of Sonic, and all the platforming of Mario.
